name: SocSec
overview:
SocSec is a social networking security organisation, focused on the security of user identities, profiles, information and data across social media sites and tools.

We highlight the pitfalls and social security issues that are out there for the general public and seasoned professionals alike who utilise social networks. We develop guides, tools, detail settings, processes and actions with a view to saving users making mistakes and falling victim to scams, cyber-bullying, stalkers or identity theft on the web.

We are not owned by any social network or security consultancy. We are completely independent and completely unbiased.

Whether you use Twitter, YouTube, MySpace, Google Buzz etc. We will show you how protect yourself from spam mail, viruses, identity theft, online abuse.
